module.title: UI: Panel
module.description:
Support for (collapsable) panels.
Attention: You need to apply the panel setup on you own, with something like
code:js>$(".panel.collapsable").cmCollapsePanel();<code
See [http://ceusmedia.de/demos/cmClasses/UI_HTML_CollapsePanel/ Collapse Panel Demo] for more information.
module.author: Christian Würker
